00097             function                register_owners( $Options = false )
00098             {
00099                   try
00100                   {
00101                         $OwnershipAccess = get_package( 'permit::ownership::ownership_access' , 'last' , __FILE__ );

00104                         $User = $UserAlgorithms->get_user();

00107                   }
